document_title: Bipolar disorder: Symptoms diagnosis and treatment
subsection_content:
It is difficult to prevent psychological disorders, but you can help yourself increase your strength when facing life's challenges.
Have a scientific diet with enough nutrients; Exercise regularly to improve mood and health; Have healthy relationships; Increase contact, chat with people, participate in social activities, group activities, and travel; Get enough sleep and don't abuse stimulants
Maintain a healthy lifestyle to overcome psychological disorders.
